attr.title: The Final Boss
attr.desc: Play as big boss of a final level. Heroes will come to kill you and you have to resist.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://carloc.itch.io/the-final-boss). Download, extract, and copy the game files to the thefinalboss/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://carloc.itch.io/the-final-boss). Download, extract, and copy the game files to the `thefinalboss/gamedata` folder.
